sn52.10:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anuruddho savatthiyam viharati andhavanasmim abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
sn52.10:1.2: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam anuruddham etadavocum:
sn52.10:2.1: “Katamenayasmato anuruddhassa viharena viharato uppanna saririka dukkha vedana cittam na pariyadaya titthanti”ti?
sn52.10:2.2: “Catusu kho me, avuso, satipatthanesu suppatitthitacittassa viharato uppanna saririka dukkha vedana cittam na pariyadaya titthanti.
sn52.10:2.7: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.10:2.8: imesu kho me, avuso, catusu satipatthanesu suppatitthitacittassa viharato uppanna saririka dukkha vedana cittam na pariyadaya titthanti”ti.
